org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.etsits103097.v131.generator

Class ETSIAuthorityCertGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.BaseCertGenerator
      • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.BaseAuthorityCertGenerator
        • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.etsits103097.v131.generator.ETSIAuthorityCertGenerator

  • public class ETSIAuthorityCertGenerator
extends BaseAuthorityCertGenerator
    Certificate Generator class for generating CA certificates for ETSI TS 103 097 v 1.3.1 standard.

    • Method Detail

      • genRootCA

        public EtsiTs103097Certificate genRootCA(java.lang.String caName,
                                         ValidityPeriod validityPeriod,
                                         GeographicRegion region,
                                         int minChainDepth,
                                         int chainDepthRange,
                                         byte[] cTLServiceSpecificPermissions,
                                         AlgorithmIndicator signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                         java.security.PublicKey signPublicKey,
                                         java.security.PrivateKey signPrivateKey,
                                         SymmAlgorithm symmAlgorithm,
                                         BasePublicEncryptionKey.BasePublicEncryptionKeyChoices encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                         java.security.PublicKey encPublicKey)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         java.security.SignatureException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Method to generate a simple self signed root CA.
        Parameters:
        caName - the id if the certificate, a string representation, Required
        validityPeriod - the validity period of this certificate, Required
        region - the geographic region of the certificate, Optional
        minChainDepth - the minimal chain length of this PKI hierarchy, Required
        chainDepthRange - the chain depth range, see 6.4.30 PsidGroupPermissions for details, Required
        cTLServiceSpecificPermissions - the SSP data used for CTL Service Specific Permissions as defined as 2 octets in 102 941 v1.3.1.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        signPrivateKey - private key used to sign this certificate, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        Returns:
        a new self signed certificate with root CA profile.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        java.security.SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

      • genRootCA

        public EtsiTs103097Certificate genRootCA(CertificateId id,
                                         ValidityPeriod validityPeriod,
                                         GeographicRegion region,
                                         SubjectAssurance subjectAssurance,
                                         PsidSsp[] appPermissions,
                                         PsidGroupPermissions[] certIssuePermissions,
                                         AlgorithmIndicator signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                         java.security.PublicKey signPublicKey,
                                         java.security.PrivateKey signPrivateKey,
                                         SymmAlgorithm symmAlgorithm,
                                         BasePublicEncryptionKey.BasePublicEncryptionKeyChoices encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                         java.security.PublicKey encPublicKey)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         java.security.SignatureException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        A more general Root CA generator constructor for custom Root CA certificate profile.
        Overrides:
        genRootCA in class BaseAuthorityCertGenerator
        Parameters:
        id - the id if the certificate, see CertificateId for details, Required
        validityPeriod - the validity period of this certificate, Required
        region - the geographic region of the certificate, Required
        subjectAssurance - the subjectAssurance, Optional.
        appPermissions - list of appPermissions, use null to not set any app permissions.
        certIssuePermissions - list of certIssuePermissions, use null to not set any cert issue permissions.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        signPrivateKey - private key used to sign this certificate, Required
        symmAlgorithm - the type of symmetric algorithm used when signing.
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        Returns:
        a new self signed certificate with root CA profile.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        java.security.SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

        public EtsiTs103097Certificate genEnrollmentCA(java.lang.String caName,

                                               GeographicRegion region,
                                               SubjectAssurance subjectAssurance,
                                               AlgorithmIndicator signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                               java.security.PublicKey signPublicKey,

                                               java.security.PublicKey signCertificatePublicKey,
                                               java.security.PrivateKey signCertificatePrivateKey,
                                               SymmAlgorithm symmAlgorithm,
                                               BasePublicEncryptionKey.BasePublicEncryptionKeyChoices encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                               java.security.PublicKey encPublicKey)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                               java.security.SignatureException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        Method to generate a simple enrollment CA with all cert permissions for enrollment CAs.
        Parameters:
        caName - the id if the certificate, a string representation, Required.
        validityPeriod - the validity period of this certificate, Required
        region - the geographic region of the certificate, Optional
        subjectAssurance - the subjectAssurance, Optional.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required if type is explicit
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        signerCertificate - the signing certificate (Root CA), Required
        signCertificatePublicKey - the signing certificates public key, Required
        signCertificatePrivateKey - the signing certificates private key, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        Returns:
        a new signed certificate with enrollment CA profile.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        java.security.SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

      • genSubCA

        public EtsiTs103097Certificate genSubCA(CertificateId id,
                                        ValidityPeriod validityPeriod,
                                        GeographicRegion region,
                                        SubjectAssurance subjectAssurance,
                                        PsidSsp[] appPermissions,
                                        PsidGroupPermissions[] certIssuePermissions,
                                        AlgorithmIndicator signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                        java.security.PublicKey signPublicKey,
                                        Certificate signerCertificate,
                                        java.security.PublicKey signCertificatePublicKey,
                                        java.security.PrivateKey signCertificatePrivateKey,
                                        SymmAlgorithm symmAlgorithm,
                                        BasePublicEncryptionKey.BasePublicEncryptionKeyChoices encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                        java.security.PublicKey encPublicKey)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.security.SignatureException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Method to create a general sub CA either enrollment or authorization CA with custom specified appPermissions and certIssuePermissions.
        Parameters:
        id - the id if the certificate, see CertificateId for details, Required
        validityPeriod - the validity period of this certificate, Required
        region - the geographic region of the certificate, Optional
        subjectAssurance - the subjectAssurance, Optional.
        appPermissions - list of appPermissions, use null to not set any app permissions.
        certIssuePermissions - list of certIssuePermissions, use null to not set any cert issue permissions.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        signerCertificate - the signing certificate (Root CA), Required
        signCertificatePublicKey - the signing certificates public key, Required
        signCertificatePrivateKey - the signing certificates private key, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        Returns:
        a newly created sub ca certificate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        java.security.SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.
